item.title: Everything about RabbitMQ
item.author: celine
item.description: RabbitMQ vs Apache Kafka 資料結構差異 The Queue(RabbitMQ) vs. The Log (Apache Kafka) Queue FIFO data structure Optimized for efficient write and read operations from either end of the sequence Stored data is transient in nature Not shared between applications Log Also known as write-ahead logs, transaction logs and commit logs Append-only. Ordered by time Unique log sequence numbers (可以用來識別這個 log 在 log data 的 position) Stored data is persistent in nature
